content.body:
### Shop 245/60R20 Tire Size
245/60R20 tires can be found on one vehicle: the Toyota 4Runner. A large SUV, the 4Runner could be used as a daily driver, work SUV, or even off-road vehicle, and typically rolls out of the factory with a set of [Bridgestone Dueler H/T 684 II](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/dueler-h-t-684-ii) or Yokohama Geolandar G96B tires attached.

Popular vehicles include:
2010-2021 Toyota 4Runner

Most drivers only use one set of tires, and all-season tires are a common choice thanks to their ability to perform in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. Take a look at the Michelin Defender LTX M/S, [Pirelli Scorpion All Season Plus 3](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/scorpion-all-season-plus-3), and General Grabber HTS60 if you need a set of 245/60R20 tires that performs year-round.

Do you take your Toyota 4Runner off-road from time to time? If that’s the case, then you’ll need a set of tires that performs on- and off-road, which is exactly what all-terrain tires do. Check out the Toyo Open Country A/T III,[Nitto Nomad Grappler](https://simpletire.com/brands/nitto-tires/nomad-grappler), and BFGoodrich Trail-Terrain T/A if you need a set of 245/60R20 tires that performs on any terrain.

Whether you need all-season, all-terrain, or another type of tire for your Toyota 4Runner, SimpleTire has a set of 245/60R20 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
